Natomi Blair
============

[City Council](https://www.leandertx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=54)
Title: Council Member, Place 3
[Email Natomi Blair](mailto:nblair@leandertx.gov)

3-year term expires May 2028

   Leander, Texas 78641

   Leander, TX 78646
